statements: DELETE FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns WHERE media_type = 'Movie' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns WHERE user_id = 123 AND media_type = 'Movie';
DELETE FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND media_title LIKE '%series%';

DELETE FROM media_ratings WHERE rating < 3.5 AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM user_demographics WHERE location = 'New York' AND age < 25;
DELETE FROM ViewerDemographics WHERE education_level = 'Bachelor' AND income_level = 'High'
